Class OrderService.TopSellingItem

java.lang.Object
edu.tamu.csce331.sharetea.database.OrderService.TopSellingItem
Enclosing class:
OrderService
public static class OrderService.TopSellingItem extends Object
Data transfer object representing analytics for a top-selling menu item.

This immutable class encapsulates sales performance data for individual menu items, providing comprehensive metrics for business analysis and reporting purposes.

The class provides the following metrics:

  • Menu item name for identification
  • Total quantity sold across all orders
  • Total revenue generated from sales
  • Number of distinct orders containing this item
Since:
1.0
